channel.description: Specifies the channels that agents can handle in the Contact Control Panel (CCP). Valid values are `VOICE`, `CHAT`, `TASK`.

concurrency.description: Specifies the number of contacts an agent can have on a channel simultaneously. Valid Range for `VOICE`: Minimum value of 1. Maximum value of 1. Valid Range for `CHAT`: Minimum value of 1. Maximum value of 10. Valid Range for `TASK`: Minimum value of 1. Maximum value of 10.
